name: 1 night at scratches: the data-base
description:
USE COMPUTER
DOWNLOAD THE APP

how to survive:

silent (black cat): hover mouse over them

glitch s (glitched cat): space bar when they show up

secret (only shows up if failed glitch): press a

VPN (the only non animal): keep the cursor away

crazed scratch (final boss): type in the code and he backs up, if you don't get the code in time, you die
